Html:
Hi,

I am new in XNA and I am having some issues with my project.The aim is to create a virtual arm prothesis in augmented reality and to animate it thanks to electrode place on a patient.

 I found some tutorial to animate 3D skinned model in virtual reality but nothing in augmented reality.

I would like to know if it is possible and any tips will be wellcome.

thanks

 

PS: sorry for my english

Unfortunately, we don't do much modeling and animation, so hopefully someone with more experience can help you out.

Ohan
